job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Would you like to get involved at the forefront of applying AI & big data technology in life sciences research and work with the leading pharma, biotech and research institutions worldwide? If you are a bioinformatician with a passion for machine learning and data analysis, please read on!

Weare looking for a skilledmachine learning engineerto jointhe datascienceteam. The successful applicant willimplement state of the artgraph neural networkmethodsfor drug target identificationwiththeEuretosKnowledge Graph.

Euretos

Euretos (www.euretos.com) provides AI driven research support as well as direct access to the Euretos AI Platform to enable in-silico discovery & validation of targets, biomarkers and indications. By integrating over 250 different public databases, the Euretos platform provides the largest single environment in which the latest multi-omics data is interlinked to literature, experimental and clinical evidence.

We enable (pre)clinical researchers to take a systems biology approach connecting molecular multi-omics interactions, through cellular involvement, to the level of functional and phenotypic characterisation that are relevant for a disease or pathology. As part of this effort, Euretosusesstatistical modeling and machine learningtocreate computational disease models.

You will be working at our offices at the Utrecht Science Park, Yalelaan 1, Utrecht.

Your Responsibilities

  • Implement state of the artmachine learning methods to expand the analytics capabilities of the Euretos AI platform, with a focus on applying deep learning and graph neural network approaches to knowledge graphs
  • Perform extensive characterisation and validation of the computational models developed by the data science team
  • Interact with bioinformaticiansand translational scientists to understand their needsandassisttheminobtainingbiological insights fromthecomputationalmodels

Your background

  • University degree, preferably a PhD, inmachine learning, computer science,statisticsor arelatedcomputational field
  • Expert programmer skills in Python andpreferablyR
  • Demonstrable experience in developing and implementing statistical models and machine learning methods for analysis of large-scale data sets
  • Hands-on experience with deep learning, specifically graph neural networks / graph convolutional networks
  • Experience working with large-scale biological datasets(-omics)is an advantage
  • Motivated toacquiredetailedknowledgeof relevantconcepts in biology and drug development
  • Strong interpersonal skills and ability to manage projects and work with cross-functional teams
  • Strong English writing and communication skills


Who you are

  • Self propelled – take initiative to bring things forward
  • Organised doer with hands-on mentality
  • Affinitywith biology and data analysis
  • Attention to detail
  • Systematic worker with a strong ability to meet deadlines

Apply Now!

Do you think you are the right person for the job? Then apply now and:

  • Send an email tojobs@euretos.comor 
  • Contact Kees Albers onLinkedIn:https://nl.linkedin.com/in/kees-albers-721088151
